attributes.action: That the government should urgently review its position with respect to members of Cabinet, including the PM, being ‘Friends of Israel’.
attributes.additional_details:
This because it is vital that senior members of government should not be open to undue influence from a foreign power, just as they must not be compromised by membership of companies or other lobby groups, which might bias their decisions.
Specifically being a ‘Friend of Israel’ prejudices their standing with relation to vital Middle East peace negotiations, especially with respect to Palestine.
That such prejudice is in fact unconstitutional.
